text.name: sys_description
text.text: Released in 2012, the Wii is a video game console marketed by Nintendo, succeeding the Wii. The Wii U is the first home console to offer a controller with an integrated touchscreen. It is the first console from Nintendo to be able to generate high definition graphics. It is equipped with a tri-core processor clocked at 1.24 GHz, an AMD Radeon "Latte" graphics chip, clocked at 550 MHz, 1 GB of DDR3 for the system + 1 GB for games. There are essential games, like Mario kart 8 and The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD.
